summary.span: 定義 XPS 封裝序列化原則的基底類別。

span.span: Defines the base class for XPS package serialization policies.

summary.span: 這個類別是抽象的。

span.span: This class is abstract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封裝原則類別提供方法來取得序列化讀取器和寫入不同類型的組件中。Packaging policy classes provide methods for acquiring serialization readers and writers for different types of parts in an .

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得字串的清單，而每個字串都表示一個 項目。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a list of strings, each expressing a element.

returns.span: 物件的 ，這些物件表示頁面的可連結目標。

span.span: An of objects that represent the linkable targets for a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用清單來撰寫`LinkTarget`可插入的項目對應頁面的項目。Use the list to compose `LinkTarget` elements that can be inserted into the element for the corresponding page. 包裝中標記的清單中的每個字串，使用下列格式：Wrap each string in the list in markup by using the following form: ``，其中*目標名稱*是字串。``, where *target name* is the string. 如需有關``和項目，請參閱中的第 3 章[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格，您可以在取得[XPS： 規格和授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `` and elements, see chapter 3 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PersistPrintTicket(class System.Printing.PrintTicket printTicket) cil managed

param.name: printTicket
param.span: 提供列印工作列印方式資訊的物件。

span.span: An object that provides information about how a print job prints.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將 Print Ticket 寫入至套件或套件的某個部分。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, writes a print ticket to a package or to a part of the package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會驗證或修改指定`printTicket`特定。This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular . 如果有必要，請使用方法來建立專屬於和適用於指定的印表機。If necessary, use the method to create a that is specific to the and is valid for a specified printer.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，先執行任何必要維護工作 (例如，清除資料流)，再認可頁面。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, performs any required maintenance tasks before the page is committed, for example, flushes streams.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，加入將目前頁面連至某個內部或外部資源的關聯性。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, adds a relationship from the current page to some internal or external resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]關聯性的組件在封裝中，請參閱本文第章 1[開放式封裝慣例](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx)結構描述。For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] relationship parts in packages, see chapter 1 of the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema.
